parameters.name: testtype
parameters.description: Type of test to use. Type: 1 indicates a total time limit  (time is set with totalTime parameter); Type 2 indicates a block-number limit (numBlocks parameter) Type: 3 indicates a trial-number limit (numTrials parameter).

parameters.name: usecontinuous
parameters.description: Determines whether the time presentation should be continuous or interval.  That is, use specific delay times in script or uniformly/continuous sample between min and max.

parameters.name: givefeedback
parameters.description: Give feedback about RT and accuracy.

parameters.name: fixationtime
parameters.description: How long the fixation cross remains on, in ms

parameters.name: totalTime
parameters.description: Total time of the test in seconds, for type 1

parameters.name: numBlocks
parameters.description: Number of repetitions of the interval set, for type 2

parameters.name: numTrials
parameters.description: Number of total trials. (120 =~ 10 minutes), for type 3

parameters.name: TooFast
parameters.description: Trial is marked too fast if rt < this value (in ms)

parameters.name: Lapse
parameters.description: Trial is marked lapse if RT > this value (in ms)

parameters.name: Sleepattack
parameters.description: Trial is 'sleep attack' if > this value (in ms)

parameters.name: usemouse
parameters.description: Whether to use mouse (1) or spacebar (0) to make responses. 0=spacebar is traditional.
